content: child s crochet cardigan a chunky one-piece cardigan worked in up-and-down stitch row of alternating single_crochet and double_crochet with single_crochet worked into dcof the row below andvice versa ribbingisinalternatingfpdc/bpdc sleeves are worked directly off thebody decreasingeveryfewrowstothewrist onlytheshouldersaresewn andmaybecrochetedorwhip- stitched together as preferred the pattern refers to the us single_crochet and double_crochet known as double_crochet and treble_crochet respectively in the uk gauge 20st / 19 row to 5 inches with 4 5mm hook in main pattern materials 4mm hook yarn creative yarns uk rainbow multi dk 8 ply 4 5mm hook small 2 balls 200g/604m 6 x 1 5cm buttons medium 3 balls 300g/906m large 3 balls 300g/906m ssiizzee ssmmaallll mmeeddiiuumm llaarrggee 2-3 yrs 4-5 yrs 6-7 yrs chest 26 inches 65cm 28 in 70cm 30 in 75 cm sleeve 10 inches 25cm 11 in 27 5cm 12 in 30cm length 14 inches 35cm 16 in 40cm 18 in 45cm abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet uk double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet uk half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet uk st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch fpdc double_crochet worked around the post of the stitch beneath with the hook inserted from the front bpdc double_crochet worked around the post of the stitch beneath with the hook inserted from the back patt pattern alternating single_crochet/double_crochet stitch body - 4 5mm hook to start chain 105 113 121 st row 1 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook double_crochet into next st single_crochet/double_crochet alternately to end turn 104 112 120 st row 2-22 26 30 ch1 single_crochet into first double_crochet double_crochet into next single_crochet repeat to end turn right front small med large row 23-35 27-43 31-51 ch1 single_crochet/double_crochet in pattern over first 22 24 26 st only turn 22 24 26 st row 36 44 52 ch1 single_crochet/double_crochet in pattern to end fasten_off row 37 45 53 miss first 6 8 10 st rejoin yarn to st 7 9 11 single_crochet in same st double_crochet in next st together patt to end turn 15 st row 38 46 54 ch1 patt to last 2 st single_crochet double_crochet together in next 2 st turn 14 st row 39 47 55 ch1 single_crochet double_crochet together in next 2 st patt to end turn 13 st row 40 48 56 as row 38 46 54 12 st row 41 49 57 ch1 patt to end turn 12 st row 42 50 58 ch1 patt to end fasten_off 12 st back rreettuurrnn rroo rrooww 2233 2277 3311 sskkiipp nneexxtt 88 uunnwwoorrkkeedd sstt ppaasstt rriigghhtt ffrroonntt aanndd rreejjooiinn yyaarrnn ttoo sstt 3311 3333 3355 cchh11 sscc iinn ssaammee sstt ppaatttt ttoo sstt 7744 8800 8866 ttuurrnn 4444 5588 5522 sstt small med large row 24-41 28-49 32-57 ch1 patt across 44 48 52 st turn row 42 50 58 ch1 patt to end fasten_off left front return ro row 23 27 31 skip next 8 unworked st past back and rejoin yarn to st 83 89 95 ch1 single_crochet in same st patt to end turn 22 24 26 st small med large row 24-36 28-44 32-52
